You think I could stay at your place tonight? Your mother's not there is she?Wouldn't bother me.Don't worry. I can handle it.There won't be any this week.Didn't show up.I don't like loading crates.What about your attitude...Where's your job...eh? You talk and talk and I go to work...what do you do?Ok, ok...take it easy. I'll show. Tuesday I'll give Michael something. Yeah...I want to report a disturbance. Yeah this man and woman next door are disturbing the peace. They're keeping me awake all night now. What the hell is this. What? Well... yelling, fighting, throwing things. Uh-huh. If they don't kill each other soon I'm goin' over there and do the job myself. Yes - the address is 270 Mott street. I think it's apartment 2-r. Yeah, right... thanks. Look, I demand immediate action. Never mind my name I don't like getting involved in things like this.Don't come any closer!!!Charlie...pssst. Over here.Hey...don't do that...I'm only scaring them.Watch this.Did you see them run!I swear to God Charlie...my arm still hurts from the car accident...that's why I didn't go to work. I swear it.I'm going to work this week...I mean it.I'm sorry Charlie...I didn't mean it.Charlie, you know the best way to take care of this whole mess.If you had a little talk with your uncle...if anybody can do it, he can.Yeah, take it easy. Will you relax.I understand.Yeah, yeah - enough.SCUMBAG--I don't forget nothin.Lower the fuckin music--I can't hear nothin.Girls? You call those skanks girls?!I feel fine--nothing wrong with me.You tell me that in front of these creeps?We won't pay...because this guy is a...mook.Count it.Don't fuckin' touch me - scumbag.What're ya hollering? You got your money.Yeah, Teresa, shut up! We don't wanna get Charlie here in trouble, do we?...We love Charlie.Oh, that's too bad, Teresa...Well kids...have the bans been announced yet?I'm not smart...I'm stupid, remember. I'm so stupid that you have to look out for me, remember?Don't be upset Teresa. You have to understand Charlie, here...he gives of himself to help others...No, you stay.Me? I wouldn't say a word to my aunt and uncle...or even your uncle, Charlie...Charlie...I always wondered about her...what happens when she comes? Does she get one of those fits? Eh? That would be something to see...You rat bastard!! Don't hit me again!!I think I will fuckin go see your uncle right now...he'd be interested.I don't know...she's your girl...I gotta go.Hate to miss the floor show, though.What you're doing for me isn't worth it...believe me!I only got eight bucks on me.No you're not...Charlie, twenty-eight bucks is nothing. The only way to do it is through your uncle...think about it will you?No, I just want to help myself, that's all.I'll be here. Don't worry.Back so soon.Hello, Michael. I've got something for you...not much...but...I bought a few rounds of drinks while waiting.You make me laugh, Michael...you know that? I've borrowed money all over the neighborhood and never paid it back...so I couldn't borrow anymore from them...so who's the only jerk off left that I can borrow from without paying back...YOU. Because that's what I think of you...Jerk off. I fuck you where you breathe!I think we should see your uncle.This can't be settled any other way now...I'll take full blame.What are you going to do? Hide me?What are you talking to yourself???
